Supported Devices

Commotion is supported on a variety of devices and platforms. We list devices as "supported" after active testing on the latest release of our software. We're constantly testing new devices and documenting our work on our developer site, wiki.commotionwireless.net.

If your device is not listed here, we encourage you to look on the developer site wiki, or contact us to ask about it!

Supported Devices by Category

Routers

Manufacturer Router Supported Version(s)
Ubiquity Ubiquiti Picostation M2/M5 R1, DR 2
  Ubiquiti Bullet M2/M5 R1, DR 2
  Ubiquiti Nanostation M2/M5 R1, DR 2
  Ubiquiti Rocket M2/M5 R1, DR 2
  Ubiquiti Unifi Outdoor R1, DR 2
     
TP-Link TL-WDR4300 R1, DR 2
